name: Flux Kontext Text to Image Generator Kie AI
description:
Generates images from text prompts using the Flux Kontext model, via the kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of November 2025):  ~$0.025 per image for Flux Kontext Pro, ~$0.05 per image for Flux Kontext Pro.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if image generation is complete). Default: 5

filename.description: Optional base filename (without extension), defaults to None (uses task_id)

outputFormat.description: Optional image format. Must be 'jpeg' or 'png'. Defaults to 'jpeg'

aspectRatio.description: Optional image aspect ratio. Must be one of '21:9', '16:9', '4:3', '1:1', '3:4', '9:16'. Defaults to '16:9'

improve_prompt.description: Optional boolean, enables automated prompt improvement (may increase processing time); defaults to False

model.description: Optional model override, must be 'flux-kontext-pro' or 'flux-kontext-max'. Defaults to 'flux-kontext-pro'

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the image to generate, in English only.

safetyTolerance.description: Optional moderation level, from 0 (strict) to 6 (permissive). Defaults to 6

saved_images_paths.description: List of local paths where images are saved

status.description: Status of the operation, e.g., 'success' or starts with 'error:'

task_id.description: The task ID from the API
